  • AMAZON ALEXA BUILT IN: Featuring the functionality of a standalone Alexa device, C by GE Sol with Amazon Alexa is wifi connected and allows you to use your voice to control lighting features, set timers, check the weather, tell time, and play music from your Alexa enabled music library
  • EXCLUSIVE FEATURES: More than a smart light, Sol features visual cues for clocks and timers, manual and automated light temperature variation that allows users to select the perfect hue to fit a mood or to ensure a smooth sleep cycle
  • SMART LAMP FOR ANY ROOM: A perfect lighting solution for the office, the bedroom, the kitchen or living room. The C by GE Sol is a smart light that enhances the security and convenience of any room through voice control and scheduling via the C by GE app
  • SMART HOME ECOSYSTEM: As an Alexa enabled device, Sol works seamlessly with a wide range of smart home connected devices and thousands of Alexa skills. Part of the C by GE family, Sol connects directly with other C by GE products such as C-Life and C-Sleep smart light bulbs
  • SLEEK MODERN DESIGN: The result of solar inspiration, Sol features a sleek design that acts as an aesthetic bridge between functional technology and interior design

From the manufacturer

View larger
Read more

Tech Specs:

Smart Homes Just Got Brighter
  • 2.4GHz Wi-fi and Bluetooth allow voice control of compatible connected devices like lights, fans, TVs, thermostats, garage doors and more
  • 2-far field microphones provide voice control in noisy environments
  • 360° omni-directional audio with great, immersive sound

C by GE Sol

Sol, from C by GE. A brighter idea for smarter homes.

Sol is an all-in-one smart light that has the features, functionality, and voice control of Amazon Alexa. The industry’s first lighting product with Amazon Alexa built in, Sol is part of GE Lighting’s vision to unleash the power of your home, enabling you and your home to do more.

Artistically Designed Conversation Piece

The versatile minimalistic form factor of the wifi connected Sol features an innovative Richard Clarkson-inspired design that fits in with any contemporary or traditional space.

Read more

Amazon Alexa and Voice Control

Use your voice to control lighting feature, get the news, stay up on the weather, and play music from your Alexa enabled music library. Privacy mode disconnects the microphone.

Visual Indicators

More than a simple table lamp, Sol allows you to pair visual light cues with everyday tasks, such as setting timers with its visible countdown clock. There’s even a function that creates traditional clock hands on Sol.

Sleep-Enabled Light

C Sleep by GE uses color temperature to adjust hues and support the human body’s circadian rhythm. Sol creates a warm light that doesn’t impede melatonin production before bed, and a cool, vibrant light that gets you up and at ‘em in the morning, helping support your body’s natural sleep/wake cycle.

Tunable Light

Dim, brighten, and tune the 60-watt replacement smart light to daylight or soft white color temperatures with a voice command or through the C by GE app. Get crisp, refreshing light in an office setting or warm, relaxing light in the family room – without changing a light bulb.

Amazon Alexa

Visual Indicators

Sleep-Enabled Light

Tunable Light

Home Office

Sol makes the perfect desk lamp providing crisp, bright dimmable light to work by, the ability to stay up to date on the news, and letting you access your schedule with voice.

Bedroom

Easy-to-schedule AM-Daytime-PM light modes support natural sleep circadian rhythms via automated light color temperature adjustment. The GE Sol also controls other connected devices like a smart thermostat and additional connected lights using the voice control via Alexa.

Kitchen

Thanks to Alexa, the C by GE Sol helps create a more productive kitchen environment. It allows you to set timers and have hands free access to recipes and measurement conversions, while serving weather and news reports upon request.

Living Room

Offering you the ability to adjust the brightness of the light and to play music through the built-in speaker, Sol helps easily set the perfect ambiance with your voice.

Read more
View larger
Read more

Product description

Sol is an all-in-one smart light that has the features, functionality, and voice control of Amazon Alexa. The industry’s first lighting product with Amazon Alexa built in, Sol is part of GE Lighting’s vision to unleash the power of your home, enabling you and your home to do more.

5.0 out of 5 starsBest customer service ever
ByAKon September 26, 2017
Verified Purchase
Best customer service ever. The lamp works great and is easy to set up and control, including other C bulbs. Originally the lamp didn't work because I have an Iphone, but the update was released two days after the lamp, but I still couldn't connect my lamp to the app. Customer service tried to get it to work, but it still wouldn't connect. They said they'd check stuff on their end since everything on my end was working. The representative called me back (how often does that happen) to let me know that some lamp identification stuff hadn't been added to their cloud and weren't recognized by their system, but it was all fixed now. On top of the call back, they're sending a $75 starter pack of bulbs for the inconvenience.

5.0 out of 5 starsSol + Alexa = Awesome
ByM. Novakon September 26, 2017
Verified Purchase
It was exciting to receive and finally try the Sol by GE Lighting! It's a beautifully designed lamp that will spark plenty of conversation in my house. The lamp has the ability to provide cool white light in the morning and warm light in the evening using the app or voice commands to change between the different colors and intensity. The set up was easy enough with my iPhone and connected right away with my home network. Having Alexa embedded in a lighting fixture is definitely unique and provides some different opportunities. I've connected the Sol with my other GE light bulbs and its nice to be able to control them all through the Sol or app. I'm looking forward to GE/Amazon turning on the rest of the functionality, especially Spotify. Overall, great cutting edge product that integrates Amazon's Alexa!

5.0 out of 5 starsGE Sol and my Securfi Almond router setup issues.
ByDRFon October 3, 2017
Verified Purchase
I received my SOL the last and was excited to set it up. I did run into a few issues with the process, but it turns out that the issue was not with the GE Sol unit, but rather with my WIFI router. The SOL setup in the CbyGE app, was very straight forward and easy to follow. Switching between the SOL and home networks was easy, but I ran into a problem in that my router would not connect with the cloud for the SOL network properly. It would set up the mac address with my router, but it would not let it be verified by the CbyGE app. I contacted GE support and they were extremely helpful to help diagnose the issue. There were also several updates to the CbyGE app, which also helped clear up a few networking issues they had early on, but the new version made it better. I even tried to set up a couple of other units on my network but it would not work. I have a SecurFI Almond router that is about 4 years old. Its an type N network and i probably have over 25 devices that connect to it. I think that is one of the big issues. I'm trying to use a router that does not have sufficient bandwidth to manage an handle all these devices let alone the new SOL. I ended up getting a new AC2550 type Dual band router. That solved the issue. Once I set up my new router and ran thru the setup it was really easy to set up the SOL in the CbyGE app and then with Amazon Alexa app. After the setup was complete, it worked like a champ. I am truly happy with what GE accomplished in creating this device. I'm also very impressed with the different capabilities of the unit. Love the brightness and color choices of the light. Has a lot of flexibility and options. I also have a Dot and Echo in my home and its very compatible with those units. One drawback I see so far is that I cannot change the wake work of the SOL. I am sure that will be resolved in the next release.
Read more
0Comment| 6 people found this helpful. Was this review helpful to you?YesNoSending feedback...

5.0 out of 5 starsInnovative & Attractive
ByRKarlRon October 9, 2017
This is a nice product. The software is a bit rough but workable, the Amazon AI is a bit lacking with some feature support but its a work in progress that I expect will improve with time. The main features I noticed were missing with how I use these is that you can't change the "wake" word (Alexa only) and you can't use this with the "everywhere" group to stream music to multiple locations. I have been in touch with GE support via phone & email both, and they have been very responsive. Otherwise, I have not had issues with the software. I'm using two of the Sol fixtures in different rooms. The GE software doesn't allow me to control the two fixtures together, it forces you to put them each in a different "location" so you are unable to make a "group" that would allow you to control them together. Not a big deal. Making schedules through the GE software is kind of a kludge for now too. I would like to make schedules that would shift the color temperature of the fixture during the day, the only way to do it is to create separate "scenes" for each fixture to change incrementally at fixed times, then "schedules" for each fixture for each change time. Too much trouble to be worth it, just way too tedious. The fixture itself is very nice, very good build quality, does a nice job as a light fixture. Sound is decent, seems to be right on par with the Echo devices.
Read more
